item.title: 交易日：经济意外，华尔街新高
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，联合太平洋公司正在探索收购诺福克南方公司的交易
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引知情人士的话报道，铁路运营商联合太平洋公司（Union Pacific）正在探讨收购竞争对手诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）的交易。【原文：Railroad operator Union Pacific is exploring a deal to acquire rival Norfolk Southern , the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国众议院将 "天才法案 "稳定币议案交由特朗普签署
item.description: 美国众议院周四通过了一项法案，为与美元挂钩的加密代币--稳定币--建立监管框架，该法案已送交唐纳德-特朗普总统，预计他将签署该法案使之成为法律。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives on Thursday passed a bill to create a regulatory framework for U.S.-dollar-pegged cryptocurrency tokens known as stablecoins, sending the bill to President Donald Trump, who is expected to sign it into law.】

item.title: 美联储大楼翻新是特朗普与鲍威尔争斗的焦点：需要了解的五件事
item.description: 美联储对位于华盛顿特区的两座历史性建筑进行了长达数年的翻修，不断攀升的费用成为特朗普政府对美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔施压活动不断升级的最新热点。【原文：The spiraling cost of the Federal Reserve's years-long renovation of two historic buildings in Washington, D.C., has become the latest flashpoint in the Trump administration's escalating pressure campaign on Fed Chair Jerome Powell, whom Trump wants out of the central bank because he hasn't delivered the interest-rate cuts he wants.】

item.title: 乌贼游戏》最后一季让 Netflix 盈利超过预期
item.description: 全球现象级电影《乌贼游戏》最后一季的播出帮助 Netflix 第二季度的盈利超过了华尔街的预期目标，该流媒体服务公司也上调了今年的收入预期。【原文：The final season of global phenomenon "Squid Game" helped Netflix beat Wall Street earnings targets for the second quarter, and the streaming service raised its revenue guidance for the year.】

item.title: 美国众议院通过加密货币行业支持的市场结构法案
item.description: 美国众议院周四通过了一项法案，将为加密货币制定监管框架，并扩大商品期货交易委员会对该行业的监督。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives passed a bill on Thursday that would develop a regulatory framework for cryptocurrencies and expand the Commodity Futures Trading Commission's oversight of the industry.】

item.title: 可口可乐转用蔗糖成本高昂，损害美国农民利益
item.description: 可口可乐 以及其他饮料和食品行业使用蔗糖代替玉米糖浆作为甜味剂的举动将很难实施，而且成本高昂，同时对美国的农民来说大多是负面的。【原文：A possible move by Coca-Cola , and other beverage and food industries, to use cane sugar instead of corn syrup as a sweetener would be difficult and expensive to implement, while mostly negative for farmers in the United States.】

item.title: 美联储主席戴利称 2025 年底前两次降息 "合理
item.description: 旧金山联储主席玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）周四重申，预计在今年年底前进行两次降息是 "合理的"，尤其是在唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税影响看起来比原先预期的要小的情况下。【原文：San Francisco Federal Reserve President Mary Daly reiterated on Thursday it is "reasonable" to expect two interest rate cuts before the end of this year, particularly with the impact of President Donald Trump's tariffs looking more muted than originally expected.】

item.title: 通讯平台 Substack 在最新一轮融资中估值 11 亿美元
item.description: Substack通讯平台周四表示，该公司在一轮融资中筹集了1亿美元，由风险投资公司Bond和Chernin Group领投，估值11亿美元。【原文：Substack has raised $100 million in a funding round led by venture capital firms Bond and the Chernin Group at a valuation of $1.1 billion, the newsletter platform said on Thursday.】

item.title: 百事公司将重塑不含人工染料和香精的乐事和 Tostitos 品牌
item.description: 百事公司高管周四表示，该公司计划在今年晚些时候重新推出其 Lay's 和 Tostitos 品牌时，重点介绍薯片或玉米片中将不再含有的人工色素或香精。【原文：PepsiCo is planning to highlight what will no longer be in its potato or tortilla chips - artificial colors or flavors - when it re-launches its Lay's and Tostitos brands later this year, executives said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国上诉法院撤销对汇丰银行高管的欺诈定罪
item.description: 美国一家上诉法院周四宣布，2017 年对汇丰银行一名前高管的欺诈定罪无效，该高管曾因 "前置操作 "一家英国油气勘探公司 35 亿美元的货币交易而入狱两年。【原文：A U.S. appeals court on Thursday voided the 2017 fraud conviction of a former HSBC executive who spent two years in prison for "front-running" a British oil and gas exploration company's $3.5 billion currency trade.】

item.title: OpenAI 推出 ChatGPT 代理，处理人工智能应用程序发展过程中的任务
item.description: OpenAI 周四为其流行的聊天机器人 ChatGPT 推出了一个人工智能代理，可以完成复杂的任务，这家由微软支持的初创公司希望在人工智能竞赛中领先于竞争对手。【原文：OpenAI launched an artificial intelligence agent for its popular chatbot ChatGPT on Thursday that can complete complex tasks as the Microsoft-backed startup looks to get ahead of competitors in the AI race.】

item.title: L3Harris 推出新型远程导弹，在太平洋地区瞄准中国
item.description: L3Harris Technologies 公司发布了两款新型导弹，旨在为美军提供成本更低的远程打击选择，因为美军正在补充补给，同时寻找武器来遏制中国在太平洋地区的野心。【原文：L3Harris Technologies has unveiled two new missiles that aim to provide less expensive long-range strike options for the U.S. military as it restocks its supplies while looking for arms to deter China's ambitions in the Pacific.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国将对来自中国的石墨征收 93.5% 的关税
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，美国商务部将对从中国进口的石墨征收93.5%的初步反倾销税，因为该部门认为作为电池关键部件的石墨材料受到了不公平的补贴。【原文：The United States Commerce Department is set to impose preliminary anti-dumping duties of 93.5% on graphite imported from China after concluding the materials, which are a key component for batteries, had been unfairly subsidized, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 英国斥资 13 亿美元提升人工智能计算能力
item.description: 英国计划投资 10 亿英镑（约合 13.4 亿美元）建设计算基础设施，以推动人工智能的发展，这将在未来五年内使其公共计算能力提高 20 倍。【原文：Britain set out its plan to invest 1 billion pounds ($1.34 billion) in computing infrastructure to drive the development of artificial intelligence, which will increase its public compute capacity 20 fold over the next five years.】

item.title: 机构投资者热捧加密货币，但需求仍处于起步阶段
item.description: 比特币本周创下历史新高，再次引发了人们对机构投资者在推动比特币走高方面所起作用的质疑，分析人士认为，机构投资者的作用仍处于初级阶段。【原文：Bitcoin's surge to a record this week has reignited questions about the role institutional investors are playing in pushing it higher, with analysts suggesting their role is still in its infancy.】

item.title: L3Harris 计划进一步扩大阿肯色州的火箭发动机生产规模
item.description: L3Harris Technologies 公司周四表示，计划扩大阿肯色州固体火箭发动机生产设施的规模，力争将大型固体火箭发动机的产量提高六倍，以满足急剧增长的需求。【原文：L3Harris Technologies plans to expand the size of its Arkansas solid rocket motor production facilities, it said on Thursday, as it seeks a sixfold production increase for large solid rocket motors to meet soaring demand.】

item.title: 意大利伦巴第选矿集团利用 Starlink 测试卫星通信服务
item.description: 意大利伦巴第大区周四在一个试点项目中选择了一个使用星链（Starlink）低轨道卫星星座的企业联盟，以了解天基连接是否是提高该国高速互联网普及率的可行解决方案。【原文：Italy's Lombardy region on Thursday picked a consortium of firms using Starlink's low-orbit satellite constellation in a pilot project to see if space-based connectivity is a viable solution to boost high-speed internet penetration in the country.】

item.title: 意大利佩科里诺奶酪生产商力争避免美国关税
item.description: 佩科里诺罗马诺奶酪是意大利最著名的出口食品之一，其生产商正在游说美国不要对其征收新的关税，因为这可能会抬高消费者的价格，并从其出口市场中分一杯羹。【原文：Producers of Pecorino Romano cheese, one of Italy's best known food exports, are lobbying to be spared new U.S. tariffs that could raise consumer prices and take a chunk out of their export market.】

item.title: 前美联储理事沃什称财政部与央行需要达成新协议
item.description: 前美联储理事凯文-沃什（Kevin Warsh）被视为美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的潜在继任者。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Governor Kevin Warsh, seen as a potential successor to Fed Chair Jerome Powell, said on Thursday there needs to be a new accord between the Treasury Department and U.S. central bank, referencing a 1951 pact that separated federal debt management from monetary policy.】

item.title: 沃尔玛墨西哥业务部第二季度利润率疲软，市值缩水 33 亿美元
item.description: 周四上午，沃尔玛墨西哥和中美洲分公司（Walmex）股价下跌 6%，市值减少 609 亿比索（32.5 亿美元），此前该公司公布的利润率低于预期。【原文：Shares in Walmart's Mexico and Central America unit, known as Walmex , slid 6% on Thursday morning, wiping off 60.9 billion pesos ($3.25 billion) from the firm's market capitalization after posting weaker-than-expected margins.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局敦促沃尔沃车主紧急召回制动器
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）周四要求瑞典汽车制造商沃尔沃（Volvo）部分车辆的车主紧急完成因刹车失灵问题的安全召回。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) on Thursday asked owners of some vehicles of Swedish automaker Volvo to urgently complete a safety recall over a brake failure issue.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，在特朗普忧虑之际，英国央行对贷款人进行美元风险审查
item.description: 三位消息人士称，英国央行已要求一些贷款机构测试其抵御潜在美元冲击的能力，这是特朗普政府的政策正在削弱人们对美国作为金融稳定基石的信任的最新迹象。【原文：The Bank of England has asked some lenders to test their resilience to potential U.S. dollar shocks, three sources said, the latest sign of how the Trump administration's policies are eroding trust in the U.S. as a bedrock of financial stability.】

item.title: 备忘录称，高盛任命哈利勒为中间市场集团全球主管
item.description: 路透社周四看到的一份备忘录显示，高盛任命其资深银行家 Aasem Khalil 为其全球业务主管，主要负责中型市场银行业务的客户覆盖。【原文：Goldman Sachs named its senior banker Aasem Khalil as global head of its business focused on client coverage in middle-market banking, a memo seen by Reuters on Thursday showed.】

item.title: 独家报道：亚马逊 AWS 云计算部门裁员
item.description: 亚马逊发言人在路透社调查后证实，亚马逊网络服务云计算部门周四裁员。AWS内部有多个部门受到了影响。【原文：Amazon cut jobs in its Amazon Web Services cloud computing unit Thursday, a spokesperson confirmed following a Reuters inquiry. Several groups within AWS were impacted.】

item.title: 机器人出租车竞争白热化，Waymo 扩大德克萨斯州奥斯汀的覆盖范围
item.description: 这家软件巨头的自动驾驶部门周四表示，Alphabet 旗下的 Waymo 正在将其在得克萨斯州奥斯汀的服务范围从之前的 37 平方英里扩大到 90 平方英里，以保护其在该市的领先地位，免受特斯拉等竞争对手的冲击。【原文：Alphabet's Waymo is expanding its service in Austin, Texas, to 90 square miles from 37 square miles earlier, the software giant's self-driving unit said on Thursday, seeking to protect its top position in the city from rivals such as Tesla.】

item.title: 美国 5 月商业库存保持不变
item.description: 5 月份，美国企业库存连续第二个月保持不变，这表明库存可能会在第二季度减少国内生产总值。【原文：U.S. business inventories were unchanged for a second straight month in May, suggesting that inventories could subtract from gross domestic product in the second quarter.】

item.title: 美国汽车安全机构裁员超过 25
item.description: 根据路透社向国会提供的数据，美国汽车安全机构正在根据特朗普政府提出的离开政府的经济激励计划裁减超过25%的员工。【原文：The U.S. auto safety agency is shedding more than 25% of its employees under financial incentive programs to depart the government offered by the Trump administration, according to data provided to Congress seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 法国 Mistral 公司新增人工智能功能，与美国聊天机器人一较高下
item.description: 法国初创公司Mistral周四宣布了其人工智能聊天机器人Le Chat的新功能，试图在美国和中国主导的全球人工智能竞赛中占据一席之地。 Mistral经常被称为法国和欧洲的人工智能冠军，它与OpenAI和Alphabet旗下的谷歌等美国巨头竞争，但在市场份额或收入方面却落后于它们。 "Mistral 在一篇博文中说："我们将通过一系列强大的新功能，让 Le Chat 变得更强大、更直观、更有趣，帮助你更深入地研究，更自然地表达，并让你的互动（文字、语音和图像）在上下文中井井有条。【原文：French start-up Mistral announced new features to its AI chatbot Le Chat on Thursday as it tries to carve out a place for itself in a global AI race dominated by the United States and China. Often presented as France's and Europe's AI champion, Mistral competes with American giants such as OpenAI and Alphabet's Google, but lags behind in terms of market share or revenues. "We're making Le Chat even more capable, more intuitive — and more fun — with a collection of powerful new features to help you research more thoroughly, express yourself more naturally, and keep your interactions — text, voice, and images — organized in context", said Mistral in a blog post.】

item.title: 备忘录称摩根大通任命北美企业银行部新领导人
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，摩根大通已任命 Mike Lister 和 Brennan Spry 为北美企业银行业务联席主管。【原文：JPMorgan Chase has appointed Mike Lister and Brennan Spry as co-heads of North America corporate banking, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】
